title: Write and run FO-12 E2E tests
description:
## Objective

Write E2E tests for the complete FO-12 flow using Playwright.

## Spec Reference

**Spec:** docs/projects/2026-02-16-fo-12/2026-02-16-fo-12-spec.md — Section: "Testing Strategy"
**E2E Reference:** docs/current/e2e/tick-quick-reference.md, docs/current/e2e/e2e-config.md

## Scope

**Files to create:**
- e2e/fo-12.test.ts — E2E test file

## Implementation

1. Read existing E2E tests (e.g., e2e/fo-01.test.ts) for patterns
2. Read docs/current/e2e/tick-quick-reference.md for E2E patterns
3. Create e2e/fo-12.test.ts covering:
   - Welcome screen (step 0): correct text, continue button
   - Name input (step 1): enter name, continue
   - Familiarity (step 2): new option labels visible, select one
   - Goal (step 3): chip selection, continue
   - Heart animation transition
   - Context/Tone steps (step 4-5): LLM-generated content loads, chip selection
   - Start screen (step 6): motivational text, "Let's Begin" button
   - Phase 1 (step 7): 10 affirmation cards, Love/Discard actions, global counter visible
   - Check-in 1 (step 8): correct copy, "Continue" button
   - Phase 2 (step 9): 10 more cards, counter continues
   - Check-in 2 (step 10): correct copy, "Continue" button
   - Phase 3 (step 11): continuous cards, counter reaches 30
   - Post-review (steps 12-14): background, notifications, paywall screens
   - Completion (step 15): 30 affirmations displayed

4. Key test scenarios:
   - Happy path: love most affirmations, reach 30 in phase 3
   - Verify global counter increments correctly across phases

## Tests

Run: node --import tsx e2e/fo-12.test.ts

Do NOT close until E2E tests pass.
closed_reason: Created e2e/fo-12.test.ts covering the complete 16-step FO-12 flow. Test covers: welcome (step 0-1), familiarity (step 2), goal (step 3), context (step 4), tone (step 5), start screen (step 6), phase 1 card review (step 7, 10 cards), check-in 1 (step 8), phase 2 card review (step 9, 10 cards), check-in 2 (step 10), phase 3 continuous review (step 11, until 30 loved), post-review mockups (steps 12-14), completion (step 15, all 30 affirmations displayed). Global counter verified across all phases. Test passes with exit code 0.
